title: Like a mix of Avenir and Universe
content:
Hi folks,

any idea what this typeface is?  
 [http://www.graphicthoughtfacility.com/about/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803154723/http:/www.graphicthoughtfacility.com/about/ "http://www.graphicthoughtfacility.com/about/")

Thanks a lot!
author: M Magazine

comments.content:
Yes.  
The web page answers your question.  
Check your browser's developer tools -- details vary by browser -- and it should tell you that the body text is "GTF Web Beta Two Three Neuzeit Regular" used as "GTF Neuzeit S Book."  
See [GTF Neuzeit S Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803154723/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-s/) at Myfonts.  
Don

Thank you Don.

Your comment is very helpful!

Best,  
L

the WhatFont toolbar add-on is really handy too. available at [http://chengyinliu.com/whatfont.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803154723/http:/chengyinliu.com/whatfont.html "http://chengyinliu.com/whatfont.html")

Took your suggestion Jodie and installed per Whatfont instructions in Firefox.  
Whatfont says this font is Georgia.  
Don
strange. worked fine for me, and read as you listed by checking the source code.
